Items.Title: Oversight - Improving Older New Yorkers’ Access to City Services.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Improving Older New Yorkers’ Access to City Services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to promoting housing stability for older adults by making available full legal representation in eviction or termination of tenancy proceedings in housing court for any person who is 60 years of age or older and establishing a housing support program for persons 60 years of age or older who are at risk of eviction or foreclosure
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Aging In Place Package - Promoting housing stability for seniors by entitling any person who is 60 years of age or older to full legal representation in eviction or termination of tenancy proceedings in housing court.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a know your rights pamphlet for older adults
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Aging In Place Package - Requiring a know your rights pamphlet for older adults.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to cultural programming relevant to prevalent spoken languages at older adult centers
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Aging In Place Package - Cultural programming relevant to prevalent spoken languages at older adult centers.
